products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing and commission of VOC detector with range of 1 – 1000 ppm isobutylene equivalent.and following accessoriesa) DigiPID internal dust filter (Pack of 5)  b) Waterproof Filter Assy, RAEGuard2 PID, Pack of 5  c) DigiPID Teflon UV electrode shield pack of 10  d) DigiPID Dust Cover  e) Air Drying Pre Filter Kit  f) DigiPID external water trap filter (Pack of 5)
